title: training  error
body:
when I training my data, error came out as following:
python train.py --cache --multi-scale

Namespace(adam=False, batch_size=4, bucket='', cache_images=True, cfg='cfg/model-spp.cfg', data='data/train_model.data', device='0,1,2,3', epochs=1000, evolve=False, img_size=[1280], multi_scale=True, name='', nosave=False, notest=False, rect=False, resume=False, single_cls=False, weights='weights/best_541_f.pt')
Using CUDA Apex device0 _CudaDeviceProperties(name='GeForce RTX 2080 Ti', total_memory=11019MB)
                device1 _CudaDeviceProperties(name='GeForce RTX 2080 Ti', total_memory=11019MB)
                device2 _CudaDeviceProperties(name='GeForce RTX 2080 Ti', total_memory=11019MB)
                device3 _CudaDeviceProperties(name='GeForce RTX 2080 Ti', total_memory=11019MB)

Start Tensorboard with "tensorboard --logdir=runs", view at http://localhost:6006/
Model Summary: 225 layers, 6.25841e+07 parameters, 6.25841e+07 gradients
Optimizer groups: 76 .bias, 76 Conv2d.weight, 73 other
Caching labels (6326 found, 0 missing, 0 empty, 0 duplicate, for 6326 images): 100%|██████████████████████████████| 6326/6326 [00:00<00:00, 7314.29it/s]
Caching images (41.3GB): 100%|██████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████| 6326/6326 [01:12<00:00, 86.67it/s]
Caching labels (1582 found, 0 missing, 0 empty, 0 duplicate, for 1582 images): 100%|██████████████████████████████| 1582/1582 [00:00<00:00, 7582.67it/s]
Caching images (2.0GB): 100%|██████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████| 1582/1582 [00:11<00:00, 134.80it/s]
Image sizes 832 - 1856 train, 1280 test
Using 4 dataloader workers
Starting training for 1000 epochs...

     Epoch   gpu_mem      GIoU       obj       cls     total   targets  img_size
     1/999      6.9G      2.52     0.218    0.0576      2.79         3  1.28e+03: 100%|█████████████████████████████| 1582/1582 [11:25<00:00,  2.31it/s]
               Class    Images   Targets         P         R   mAP@0.5        F1: 100%|██████████████████████████████▉| 395/396 [01:00<00:00,  6.58it/s]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 412, in <module>
    train()  # train normally
  File "train.py", line 317, in train
    dataloader=testloader)
  File "/home/zrway/mj/work/fsc_detection_spp_v2/test.py", line 89, in test
    inf_out, train_out = model(imgs, augment=augment)  # inference and training outputs
  File "/home/zrway/miniconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 532, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/home/zrway/miniconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/distributed.py", line 449, in forward
    outputs = self.parallel_apply(self._module_copies[:len(inputs)], inputs, kwargs)
  File "/home/zrway/miniconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/distributed.py", line 474, in parallel_apply
    return parallel_apply(replicas, inputs, kwargs, self.device_ids[:len(replicas)])
  File "/home/zrway/miniconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/parallel_apply.py", line 85, in parallel_apply
    output.reraise()
  File "/home/zrway/miniconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/_utils.py", line 394, in reraise
    raise self.exc_type(msg)
TypeError: Caught TypeError in replica 2 on device 2.
Original Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/zrway/miniconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/parallel_apply.py", line 60, in _worker
    output = module(*input, **kwargs)
  File "/home/zrway/miniconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 532, in __call__
    result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
TypeError: forward() missing 1 required positional argument: 'x'
